lines.text: Jumpin' jackrabbits. What kind of jigity you call that?
That's a ballet of wood nymphs.
They ain't wearin' enough clothes to flag a handcar.
Good morning Margie. Don't mind me calling you by you're name on this program, but would you mind stepping up here for a minute?
[Margie hesitates, while her friends tell her to go ahead]
[Roy steps of the platform onto the sidewalk]
Would you care to answer a few simple questions?
Are you going to ask them?
First question. As shopper would you condemn a can of corn beef if you've never heard of the brand before?
Yes I would, if I found it was all corn and no beef.
You see folks she's just as bright as she pretty. And what a smile she has. Just the sun breakin' over the mesa after a thunder squaw.
And with an answer like that, Margie, you're entitled to twelve ears of shiny golden corn, compliments of the Medley market.
